name: Leave of absence to serve as bone marrow donor or organ donor
text:
Any officer or employee in the service of the State or any of the several counties shall be entitled to:



	(1)	Seven days of paid leave each calendar year to serve as a bone marrow donor; and
	(2)	Thirty days of paid leave each calendar year to serve as an organ donor. [L 2005, c 176, §1]
